meanings.definition: A range of frequencies that are allowed to pass through a filter or system.
meanings.sent1: The passbands of the radio receiver determine which signals can get through.
meanings.sent2: The passbands of the internet router control the data flow.
meanings.sent3: The passbands of the security gate let only authorized vehicles enter.
meanings.sent4: Her mind acted like passbands, filtering out unnecessary information.
meanings.sent5: The passbands of the telescope lens revealed the hidden stars clearly.

meanings.definition: The specific frequencies within a range that are allowed to pass through a filter or system.
meanings.sent1: The passbands of the music equalizer enhance certain tones.
meanings.sent2: The passbands of the light filter allow only red and blue light to pass.
meanings.sent3: The passbands of the sunglasses made everything look like a rainbow.
meanings.sent4: His words hit her heart like passbands, resonating deeply within.
meanings.sent5: The passbands of the security system detected the intruder immediately.
